channel.title: gamedev on Jenny Tang
channel.description: Recent content in gamedev on Jenny Tang

item.title: Game Dev Blog #2: Dialogue Struggle Bus
item.description: After spending approximately 4 hours failing to deserialize my XML dialogue, I decided I hated the lack of Monogame resources and attempted a brief flirtation with Unity, believing it would be more streamlined.

item.title: Game Dev Blog #1: Dialogue Screen
item.description: Making a game as hard AF. 15 hours in, and I have managed to scrape (and I mean scrape) together a somewhat working dialogue screen with one character speaking.

item.title: Untitled Game
item.description: Follow along Y, an investigative journalist, on her new move to X and uncover the truth behind the princess’ mysterious death.
